{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Attack Stone (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Attack Stone |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts auto-attack damage by 50%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 750 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Attack Stone |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts auto-attack damage by 58%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 750 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Attack Stone |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts auto-attack damage by 66%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 750 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Attack Stones''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Attack Up |caption = Boosts damage dealt. |image = XC3 Attack Up.png |type = Buff |base-duration = 20.0s |max-duration = 40.0s |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base Attack Boost |effect-value-1 = 25% }} '''Attack Up''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It temporarily increases the character's damage dealt.
The damage increase is additive with most other damage-enhancing effects in the game, such as accessories that increase damage dealt under certain conditions.
==Distribution==
===Arts=== *[[Shadow Eye (XC3)|Shadow Eye]] ([[Swordfighter]]) *[[Leaping Current]] ([[Thaumaturge]]) *[[Battle Pheromone]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Gracious Titania]]) *[[Power Ring]] ([[Medic Gunner]]; field effect with effect value of 40%) *[[Profound Strength]] ([[Teach]]) *[[Tyrant Wave]] ([[Lanz]]'s [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Order]]) *[[The Indomitable]] ([[Cammuravi]]'s Chain Order)
===Skills=== *Preemption Gambit ([[Strategos]]; chance-based trigger at battle start) *Feline Righting Reflex ([[Martial Artist]]; chance-based trigger)
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Aural Enhance Sensor |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts accuracy during the night by 20%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 1390 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Aural Enhance Sensor |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts accuracy during the night by 25%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 1390 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Aural Enhance Sensor |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts accuracy during the night by 30%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1390 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Aural Enhance Sensors''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|the Poppiswap item in {{XC2|-}}|Avenger (XC2)}} {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Avenger |image =XC3_Avenger.jpg |caption = Avenger |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |type = [[Keves Forces]] |level = 55 (1st fight)
56 (2nd fight) |area = [[Everblight Plain]] ([[Rottswoe Battlescar]]) |spawntime = During ''[[Shadow of Enmity]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |ether = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} The '''Avenger''' is a [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. He is a [[Keves Forces|Kevesi Soldier]], and is fought twice at [[Rottswoe Battlescar]] on [[Everblight Plain]] during ''[[Shadow of Enmity]]'', first at level 55 and then again at level 56. {{clr}} == Overview == The Avenger is a Kevesi soldier who was the sole survivor of his colony in a battle against [[Colony Chi]] led by '''All-Slayer Oleg''', also known as [[Teach]]. He seeks to avenge his comrades by killing Teach. {{clr}} == Gallery == XC3_Avenger2.jpg|Avenger with Weapon Avenger_Flameclock.jpg|The Flame Clock of Avenger's destroyed Ferronis XC3 Avenger Icon.png|Avenger's unused Affinity Chart Icon {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 51-55 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 56-60 Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Keves Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:Pages needing plot info]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Avis |image = |caption = Avis |category = Normal Enemy |type = [[Levnis]] |level = 7 - 47 |area = [[Alfeto Valley]]
[[Millick Meadows]]
[[Captocorn Peak]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Avis''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are [[Agnus|Agnian]] [[Levnis]]es, and can be found at level 29 - 30 in the [[Millick Meadows]], level 7 - 34 in [[Alfeto Valley]], and level 47 in [[Erythia Sea]] and [[Captocorn Peak]]. {{clr}} == Stats == {{Enemy stats}} === Arts === {{Enemy arts|art1=Arm Shot}} {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Levnises]] [[Category:XC3 Level 1-5 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 11-15 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 16-20 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 21-25 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 26-30 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 31-35 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 46-50 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Levnises]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

revision.comment: don't think any enemies use this buff, could be wrong tho
revision.text:
{{For|the aura in {{XC}}|Awakening (XC1)}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Awakening |caption = Improves Atk, Def. and recharge rate. |image = XC3 Awakening.png |type = Buff |base-duration = 20.0s |max-duration = 40.0s |rng-applicable = No |effect-title-1 = Base Damage Bonus |effect-value-1 = 75% |effect-title-2 = Damage Reduction |effect-value-2 = 25% |effect-title-3 = Recharge Bonus |effect-value-3 = 50% }} '''Awakening''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It boosts the character's damage output, reduces their damage taken, as well as increases their Art recharge speed.
In {{XC3FR|sub}}, it can only be inflicted by performing a successful [[Unity|Unity Combo]] against a [[Launch (XC3)|launched]] enemy.
Uniquely among all buffs, the damage reduction and recharge bonus are not affected by equipment that improves buff power (the damage bonus is affected as normal).
== Distribution == === Arts === *[[Deflector Field]] ([[Guardian Commander]]; requires getting hit to activate) ===Skills=== *[[Seraph#Skills|Beast Mode]] ([[Seraph]]; triggers upon accumulating damage) *[[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Battle Fever]] ([[Soulhacker]]; chance-based trigger on enemy defeat, requires Soul Hacking [[Fleeting Shikino]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
